rooms.description: Entryway with traditional Kerala stone flooring.
Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation; designed in the Nalukettu style with decorative wooden panels.
Modern yet traditional design kitchen located adjacent to the dining area, featuring Vastu-compliant layout with proper sunlight orientation.
Adjacent to the kitchen with a central position for social interactions; enhanced natural lighting through large windows.
Comfortable guest room, traditional Kerala style with ventilation openings.
Traditional bathroom with emphasis on natural light and ventilation; Vastu compliant layout.

openings.design_details: Carved wooden door following traditional Kerala motifs.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light, with adjustable shutters.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom oriented towards the east to maximize morning sunlight; features traditional Kerala style decor and adequate ventilation.
Traditional bedroom with natural light and ventilation, using local materials for flooring.
Comfortable third bedroom featuring traditional Kerala aesthetics and proper ventilation.
Dedicated home office with an east-facing window to ensure ample natural light; designed for a quiet, productive environment following Vastu principles.
Spacious bathroom with focus on natural light and ventilation, using traditional Kerala materials.

openings.description: East-facing window to enhance morning sunlight.

openings.design_details: Carved wooden door with traditional Kerala motifs.
